data.title: Love this place
data.text: This is my family's go to place when no one wants to cook. The burgers taste just like we made them at home.

data.title: Best Burger in Stafford and surrounding areas
data.text: This place is a Stafford staple for over 30 years now. Great burgers, amazing Chinese food. Don't miss out on the onion rings. The workers are great

data.title: Great Fast Food
data.text: One of the best burgers in town. We all had the burger combo. It was reasonably priced.  Burger tastes like homemade.

data.title: Damn good made to order Burgers
data.text:
This place is a staple in Stafford Tx. Been around for 30+ years.  Family owned and operated.  

Burgers are made to order, flamed broiled with in house grounded beef.  Onion rings are to die for!!
 
This place also serves very tasty Chinese food. The fried rice is a meal in its self.  And once again, made to order. And best of all, everything is very well priced.

data.title: A Blast From the Past
data.text: This diner will remind you of days gone by circa 1970's.They have the best old fashioned hamburgers and onion rings wrapped in white paper with a tooth pick.the service is quick and efficient. There are old fashioned tables, booths, chairs and a Pac Man table,that add ambience. If you are in Stafford or Missouri City, Texas , you owe it to your self to stop by!

data.title: They grind their own ground beef
data.text:
When you are in the mood for a great well seasoned hamburger, this little place is a gem.  Located SW of Houston on South Main Street in Stafford Texas, most would pass on by thinking it is a hole in the wall.  Well the locals know this is the go-to place in SW Houston when you just gotta have a burger.....and not what those franchise places call a burger either.

Here at Best Burger, they grind and season their own beef....no frozen patties need apply!  The burgers are char-broiled to perfection and include a broad array of fixings.  Also the 'Freedom Fries' are of the hand cut thick crinkle-cut variety, not previously frozen.  Soft drink refills are $0.25.

When you really just have to have a burger, Best Burger is well worth the side trip.  I will be back.
